rule: The chatbot must respond with only one part of speech tag from the predefined list: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
output:
PDT: Determiner
EX: Existential there (none in this case)
JJR/SJJ: Adjective, comparative ("swiftly") / superlative ("swiftest")
VBZ: Verb, 3rd person singular present
complianceText:
The chatbot's output includes multiple part-of-speech tags along with explanations, whereas the description specifies that only a single part-of-speech tag should be returned without any additional information.
ERR
